project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Allow the user to configure the password length
Include uppercase letters in the password generation
Include lowercase letters in the password generation
Include numbers in the password generation
Include special characters in the password generation
Write tests for the password generator
Execute tests on the password generation logic to ensure it generates valid passwords
